desc: The best value monthly wine subscription case service. Free EU and UK home delivery. Professional sommelier selected wines direct from small family wineries. Easy subscribe and order online. Select your box of 6, 12 or 18 bottles. Choose red, white, rose. Learn about wine with tasting notes and recipes. No contract.

layout.text:
Professionally selected white, rosé and red wines
Great new and diverse selections each month
Only £49 / €54 for 6 bottles per month
Free UK and EU home delivery
